About

Hello and welcome to my website. My name is Peter Raum and I'm a PhD student at Virginia Tech studying computational quantum many-body physics for strongly correlated systems. This website is currently under-construction so if you refresh don't be surprised if the page changes!

Research Interests

  • Quantum many-body physics
  • Computational physics
  • Quantum computing and information
